'''Genshin Impact × Duolingo''' is a collaborative effort between ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' creators [[miHoYo]] and the language learning app {{w|Duolingo}} in [[Version 4.7]].

==Collaborations==
To date, there has been '''1''' collaboration between ''Genshin Impact'' and Duolingo.

===2024 - Klee and Duo===
This collaboration has a theme around [[Klee]] and Duo, the Duolingo mascot. 

The event page has codes for both platforms to promote the collaboration.
The redemption codes are as follows:
* Genshin Impact: [https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/gift?code=DUOIMPACT DUOIMPACT] {{Item List|Primogem*30;Hero's Wit*2;Mora*20000;Sweet Madame*3;Chicken-Mushroom Skewer*3}}
* Duolingo: [https://www.duolingo.com/redeem GENSHINLINGO]
